title: Mr Boukadoum signs the register of condolences following the death of Tanzanian President John Pompe Magufuli
text: The Minister of Foreign Affairs, Mr Sabri Boukadoum, proceeded today, at the headquarters of the Embassy of the United Republic of Tanzania in Algiers, on behalf of the President of the Republic Mr Abdelmadjid Tebboune, to the signing of the book of condolences, following the death on Wednesday March 17, 2021 of the Tanzanian President John Pombe Magufuli.
